definition: against the stream/adverse current/a countercurrent/fig. reactionary tendency/to go against the trend
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to sail against the current/(fig.) to go against the flow
equatorial counter current
to go back to the source

sentences.english: To me, in the love of the river, I often feel like I was upstream .
sentences.chinese: 于我，在爱情的河流里，我经常觉得自己在逆流而上。

sentences.english: Echocardiography demonstrated tricuspid chordae tendinae rupture with remarkable tricuspid regurgitation .
sentences.chinese: 心脏超音波证实三尖瓣腱索断裂及明显的三尖瓣逆流。

sentences.english: None but a mad man would swim against the stream.
sentences.chinese: 只有疯子才会逆流而游。

sentences.english: Water-saving of counter-flow wet cooling tower is the key of water-saving work for the thermal power plant.
sentences.chinese: 逆流湿式冷却塔的节水是火力发电厂节水工作的关键。

sentences.english: Oesophagitis is inflammation of the inner lining of the oesophagus caused by repeated episodes of gastro-oesophageal reflux.
sentences.chinese: 胃食管反复逆流致使食道内部上火，从而导致食管炎。

sentences.english: Are you swimming upstream in oceans of blue?
sentences.chinese: 你是否在一片深海逆流而游？

sentences.english: What is a counter-current type separators?
sentences.chinese: 您知道什么是逆流型磁选机？

sentences.english: Because when you know you're treading uncharted waters, you're following the compass of your heart.
sentences.chinese: 因为你知道你在逆流而上，你在追随你内心的指南针。

sentences.english: The boat is sailing up the Seine.
sentences.chinese: 小船在塞纳河中逆流而上。

sentences.english: The compound tray has no down comer, gas and liquid counter flow through the holes of on the tray.
sentences.chinese: 复合塔板不设降液管，气液同时逆流穿过筛孔。

sentences.english: Selection and optimization of experimental system of high speed countercurrent chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 高速逆流色谱实验体系的选择和优化。

sentences.english: As salmon moves upstream to spawn, bear feasts.
sentences.chinese: 当鲑鱼逆流去产卵时，熊就会大块朵颐。

sentences.english: Block of road of ④ congenital make water or unusual and cause refluent person.
sentences.chinese: 先天性尿路梗阻或异常而引起逆流者。

sentences.english: Don't stop, so the beast's upstream instead.
sentences.chinese: 转来转去不停止，于是石兽反而逆流而上了。
顺雅鲁藏布江逆流而上，是日喀则。

sentences.english: Was it an early Portuguese explorer who traveled up the Mangoky River?
sentences.chinese: 是早期沿着曼戈基河逆流而上的葡萄牙探险家吗？

torrent/torrential current/whitewater
to flow backwards/reverse flow
to surge up violently (of ocean, river, lake etc)/turbulent
river/stream
undercurrent
a powerful current/a flood (often fig., e.g. a flood of ideas)
strong current/CL:股[gu3]
to flow at great speed/to pour/racing current
to make an about-turn/to reverse one's direction, policy, sequence etc/to turn things on their head
turbulence
turbid flow/muddy waters/fig. a contemptible person/fig. corrupt or disgraceful social trends
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
(of torrents) rush down/pour down
to set sail/to brave the waves
to roll over and over (of billows or clouds)
